description: Converts a datatable to a CSV string.

input.name: data
input.description: An object containing columns and rows.

input.name: separator
input.description: Character used as column delimiter. Defaults to `,`.

input.name: newline
input.description: Character used as row delimiter. Defaults to `\n` (newline).

input.name: columns
input.description: A list of columns to be included in the CSV text. Defaults to `null` (all columns).
